data.title: Ed Allard
data.meta_description: Edward Allard came to PopCap Games in August 2005 as part of its acquisition of Sprout Games, where Ed was a co-founder and creative director. At Sprout, Ed was responsible for the design and development of the hit title Feeding Frenzy, which has been...
data.text:
Edward Allard came to PopCap Games in August 2005 as part of its acquisition of Sprout Games, where Ed was a co-founder and creative director. At Sprout, Ed was responsible for the design and development of the hit title Feeding Frenzy, which has been played by millions worldwide.

Prior to forming Sprout Games, Edâ€™s experience spanned a broad range of roles from engineer at Silicon Graphics to sound designer for TiVo set-top boxes.
